verses.verse: The Mighty <WH410> One, <WH430> God, Yahweh, <WH3068> speaks, <WH1696> and calls <WH7121> the earth <WH776> from <WH8121> sunrise <WH4217> to sunset. <WH3996>
Out of Zion, <WH6726> the perfection <WH4359> of beauty, <WH3308> God <WH430> shines forth. <WH3313>
Our God <WH430> comes, <WH935> and does not keep silent. <WH2790> A fire <WH784> devours <WH398> before <WH6440> him. <WH3966> It is very stormy <WH8175> around him. <WH5439>
He calls <WH7121> to the heavens <WH8064> above, <WH5920> to the earth, <WH776> that he may judge <WH1777> his people: <WH5971>
"Gather <WH622> my saints <WH2623> together to me, <WH3772> those who have made a covenant <WH1285> with me by sacrifice. <WH2077>"
The heavens <WH8064> shall declare <WH5046> his righteousness, <WH6664> for God <WH430> himself is judge. <WH8199> Selah. <WH5542>
"Hear, <WH8085> my people, <WH5971> and I will speak; <WH1696> Israel, <WH3478> and I will testify <WH1696> against you. <WH430> I am God, your God. <WH430>
I don't <WH3198> rebuke you for your sacrifices. <WH2077> Your burnt offerings <WH5930> are continually before me. <WH8548>
I have no need <WH3947> for a bull <WH6499> from your stall, <WH1004> nor male goats <WH6260> from your pens. <WH4356>
For every animal <WH2416> of the forest <WH3293> is mine, <WH929> and the livestock on a thousand <WH505> hills. <WH2042>
I know <WH3045> all the birds <WH5775> of the mountains. <WH2022> The wild animals <WH2123> of the field <WH7704> are mine. <WH5978>
If I were hungry, <WH7456> I would not tell <WH559> you, <WH8398> for the world is mine, <WH4393> and all that is in it.
Will I eat <WH398> the flesh <WH1320> of bulls, <WH47> or drink <WH8354> the blood <WH1818> of goats? <WH6260>
Offer <WH2076> to God <WH430> the sacrifice of thanksgiving. <WH8426> Pay <WH7999> your vows <WH5088> to the Most High. <WH5945>
Call <WH7121> on me in the day <WH3117> of trouble. <WH6869> I will deliver <WH2502> you, <WH3513> and you will honor me."
But to the wicked <WH7563> God <WH430> says, <WH559> "What right do you have to declare <WH5608> my statutes, <WH2706> that you have taken <WH5375> my covenant <WH1285> on your lips, <WH6310>
since you hate <WH8130> instruction, <WH4148> and throw <WH7993> my words <WH1697> behind you? <WH310>
When you saw <WH7200> a thief, <WH1590> you consented <WH7521> with him, <WH2506> and have participated with adulterers. <WH5003>
"You give <WH7971> your mouth <WH6310> to evil. <WH7451> Your tongue <WH3956> frames <WH6775> deceit. <WH4820>
You sit <WH3427> and speak <WH1696> against your brother. <WH251> You <WH5414> slander <WH1848> your own mother <WH517>'s son. <WH1121>

You have done <WH6213> these things, <WH2790> and I kept silent. You thought <WH1819> that I was just <WH1961> like you. <WH3198> I will rebuke you, <WH6186> and accuse you in front of your eyes. <WH5869>
"Now consider <WH995> this, <WH7911> you who forget God, <WH433> lest I tear you into pieces, <WH2963> and there be none to deliver. <WH5337>
Whoever offers <WH2076> the sacrifice of thanksgiving <WH8426> glorifies <WH3513> me, <WH7760> and prepares his way <WH1870> so that I will show <WH7200> God <WH430>'s salvation to him. <WH3468>"
